Document: ##Salads -Mothic Salad = Microwave 1 Cabbage + 1 Red Onion slice + 1 Tomato for 10 seconds -Fleet Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Mothic Salad + 1 Carrot + 1 Bread Slice + 1 Cheese Wedge + 5u Vinaigrette for 10 seconds -Cotton Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Mothic Salad + 1 Cotton + 1 Carrot + 5u Vinaigrette for 10 seconds -Kachumbari Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Mothic Salad + 1 Chili + 1 Red Onion + 1 Ambrosia Vulgaris + 5u Lime Juice for 10 seconds -Melon Fruit bowl = Microwave 1 Watermelon + 1 Apple + 1 Banana + 1 Lemon + 1 Orange + 1 Ambrosia Vulgaris for 5 seconds -Caprese Salad = Microwave 1 Tomato + 1 Mozzarella + 1 Ambrosia Vulgaris + 5u Vinaigrette for 10 seconds -Valid Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Ambrosia Vulgaris + 1 Potato + 1 Meatball for 5 seconds -Fruit Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Orange + 1 Apple + 1 Grape + 2 Watermelon Slices for 5 seconds -Citrus Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Orange + 1 Lemon + 1 Lime for 5 seconds -Jungle Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Banana +1 Apple + 1 Grape +2 Watermelon Slices for 5 seconds -Herb Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 3 Ambrosia Vulgaris + 1 Apple for 5 seconds -Caesar Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Red Onion Slice + 1 Bread Slice + 1 Cheese Wedge + 1 Cabbage + 5u Olive Oil for 5 seconds -Kimchi Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Carrot + 1 Cabbage + 1 Garlic + 5u Vinegar for 5 seconds -Coleslaw = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Red Onion + 1 Cabbage + 5u Vinaigrette for 5 seconds
